name: Sidequest: A Glaive and his Human
name_original: Sidequest: A Glaive and his Human
description:
Sidequest: A Glaive and his Human is an adventure game developed by LofiGigaBytes39. It came out on 09-12-2020.
You can play Sidequest: A Glaive and his Human on Web. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
